natural_request: Create a case with thermal plants

correct_code.instruction: To create a thermal plant a fuel and a system must be created before
correct_code.code:
CREATE_STUDY 
 CREATE System 
 SET code: 1 
 SET name : System1 
 ADD System 
 
 CREATE Fuel 
 SET code: 1 
 SET name: 'gas' 
 SET RefSystem : 1 
 ADD Fuel 
 
  CREATE ThermalPLant 
 SET code: 1 
 SET name: ThermalGas1 
 SET RefSystem: 1 
 SET RefFuel: 1 
 SET 
 ADD ThermalPlant

SAVE_STUDY

incorrect_code.error: The ThermalPlant can be created without a Fuel and a System
incorrect_code.code:
CREATE_STUDY 
 CREATE ThermalPLant 
 SET code: 1 
 SET name: ThermalGas1 
 SET RefSystem: 1 
 SET RefFuel: 1 
 SET 
 ADD ThermalPlant

natural_request: Create a hydroelectric plant with a reservoir

correct_code.instruction: To create a hydroelectric plant, a system and a station must be created first
correct_code.code:
CREATE_STUDY
CREATE System
SET code: 1
SET name: System1
ADD System

CREATE HyudroStation
SET code: 1
SET name: Station1
SET RefSystem: 1
ADD HydroStation

CREATE HydroPlant
SET code: 1
SET name: Hydro1
SET RefSystem: 1
SET RefStation: 1
SET InstalledCapacity: 500
ADD HydroPlant
SAVE_STUDY

incorrect_code.error: The HydroPlant references a station that doesn't exist
incorrect_code.code:
CREATE_STUDY
CREATE System
SET code: 1
SET name: System1
ADD System

CREATE HydroPlant
SET code: 1
SET name: Hydro1
SET RefSystem: 1
SET RefStation: 1
SET installedCapacity: 500
ADD HydroPlant
SAVE_STUDY

natural_request: Create a Interconnection connecting two systems

correct_code.instruction: To create a interconnection, both origin and destination systems must exist first
correct_code.code:
CREATE_STUDY
CREATE System
SET code: 1
SET name: System1
ADD System

CREATE System
SET code: 2
SET name: System2
ADD System

CREATE Interconnectiopn
SET code: 1
SET name: Line1-2
SET RefSystems: [1, 2] 
SET CapacityFromTo: 300
ADD Interconnectiopn
SAVE_STUDY

incorrect_code.error: The Interconnection references System2 which hasn't been created
incorrect_code.code:
CREATE_STUDY
CREATE System
SET code: 1
SET name: System1
ADD System

CREATE Interconnection
SET code: 1
SET name: Line1-2
SET RefSystemFrom: 1
SET RefSystemTo: 2
SET capacity: 300
ADD Interconnection
SAVE_STUDY
